name: MEDICATION_NOTES
description: This table contains medication note information that can be attached to the medication order from order entry or other medication-related activities.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the order record containing the medication note

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MED_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number for this medication note.

columns.name: MED_NOTE_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient encounter when this note was created. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: MED_NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who wrote the medication note.

columns.name: MED_NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MED_NOTE_INSTANT
columns.description: The date and time when the medication note was created
